name: Chickenfruits
description:
Platform: Android.

Program: Livecode.

Link Google Play: Chickenfruits

Chicken Fruits is a funny game that you have to turn around the phone to control the flying chicken and eat the delicious fruits without crashing into the levels of the game.

The game work with the Accelerometer of the telephone, this sensor allows movement of the Chicken.

Have fun and have a good time with this fantastic app.
